description.en: This Re-Stat scroll allows you to recover 50 points previously allocated to Stamina (STA). Only applies to your current stat page.
description.ar: This Re-Stat scroll allows you to recover 50 points previously allocated to Stamina (STA). Only applies to your current stat page.
description.br: Reembolsa 50 pontos que foram anteriormente adicionados em VIG para que possam ser utilizados novamente. Aplica-se apenas à sua página de atributos atual.
description.cns: 重置50体质属性点，仅对当前属性页有效。
description.de: Mit dieser Restat-Schriftrolle kannst du 50 Punkte zurückgewinnen, die du zuvor der Ausdauer (STA) zugewiesen hast. Gilt nur für deine aktuelle Stat Seite.
description.fi: This Re-Stat scroll allows you to recover 50 points previously allocated to Stamina (STA). Only applies to your current stat page.
description.fil: This Re-Stat scroll allows you to recover 50 points previously allocated to Stamina (STA). Only applies to your current stat page.
description.fr: Permet de libérer 50 points que vous aviez dépensé en END sur la page actuelle.
description.id: Scroll Re-Stat ini memungkinkan anda memulihkan 50 poin yang sebelumnya dialokasikan ke Stamina (STA). Hanya berlaku untuk halaman stat anda saat ini..
description.it: This Re-Stat scroll allows you to recover 50 points previously allocated to Stamina (STA). Only applies to your current stat page.
description.jp: 体力に付与した能力値のうち、50だけを初期化します。現在のステータスページにのみ適用
description.kr: This Re-Stat scroll allows you to recover 50 points previously allocated to Stamina (STA). Only applies to your current stat page.
description.nl: This Re-Stat scroll allows you to recover 50 points previously allocated to Stamina (STA). Only applies to your current stat page.
description.pl: This Re-Stat scroll allows you to recover 50 points previously allocated to Stamina (STA). Only applies to your current stat page.
description.ru: This Re-Stat scroll allows you to recover 50 points previously allocated to Stamina (STA). Only applies to your current stat page.
description.sp: Este pergamino Re-Estado te permite recuperar 50 puntos de los anteriormente usados en Aguante (STA). Solo se aplica a sus estadísticas actuales.
description.sw: This Re-Stat scroll allows you to recover 50 points previously allocated to Stamina (STA). Only applies to your current stat page.
description.th: คัมภีร์ รีเซ็ต Stat นี้ทำให้คุณได้รับ 50 คะแนนที่จัดสรรให้กับ Stamina (STA) คืนมา มีผลกับหน้า Stat ปัจจุบันเท่านั้น
description.tw: 此重置數值卷軸可讓您恢復之前分配給體力 (STA) 的 50 點。 僅適用於您當前的統計頁面。
description.vi: Re-Stat scroll cho phép bạn khôi phục 50 điểm đã được phân bổ trước đó cho Stamina (STA). Chỉ áp dụng cho trang stat hiện tại của bạn.
